title: Research

Research

Joint Statistical Meeting (JSM) 2023: Weighting-augmented regression adjustment for indirect comparisons under data access constraints


International Society of Pharmaceutical and Outcome Research (ISPOR) 2024: Modelling Uncertain Heterogeneity for Decision Analytic Models: An Early Exploration

title: About
text:
Chengyang Gao
    PhD Student
    
    
      I am a PhD student in Statistics at University College London, where I develop methods for causal inference in the context of health technology assessment and value of information analysis.
      
      On this site, you'll find a list of my research projects and contact information. A blog - for notes, TILs and occasional technical writing - is coming soon.
